title: Audax Collects $1.85 Billion for New Debt Fund
sub_head: The mezzanine-focused fund is more than 50% larger than its predecessor
body:
Audax Private Debt, the debt financing unit of multistrategy investment firm Audax Group, has closed on $1.85 billion for its fifth mezzanine fund to target private-equity backed midmarket businesses.
Commitments to Audax Mezzanine Fund V exceeded the firmâ€™s fundraising target of $1.5 billion, Audax said. New York-based Audax Private Debt invests in private-equity backed midmarket companies through a variety of strategies, including first- and second-lien and junior debt as well as equity co-investments.
